function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of political agreement and concerted action to reduce global GHGs","Impact":"Increased risk of climate change and its impacts on public health and spread of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Global cooperation, advocacy, and community engagement in climate change mitigation and adaptation","Technologies":"Renewable energy technologies, carbon capture and storage, and sustainable land use practices","People":"Global population, especially in vulnerable communities","Owner":"Global governmental organizations, NGOs, and local communities"},{"Description":"Complexity in policy-making and implementation at different government levels","Impact":"Inconsistent adoption of health and safety measures in buildings, leading to potential spread of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Cross-government collaboration, standardization of health and safety regulations, public health education","Technologies":"Building management systems, indoor air quality monitoring, and contactless technologies","People":"Building occupants, communities, and public health agencies","Owner":"Policy-makers, regulatory bodies, and building management professionals"},{"Description":"Shift of power from central government to local communities","Impact":"Variability in the adoption and enforcement of health and safety measures in buildings, affecting public health and disease transmission","Mitigation":"Community empowerment, education on building health and safety standards, local government oversight","Technologies":"Community engagement platforms, building health assessment tools, and public health surveillance systems","People":"Local communities, building occupants, and public health agencies","Owner":"Local government authorities, community organizations, and public health agencies"}]}
